create table memo (num int auto_increment primary key, writer varchar(30), content varchar(1000), avata varchar(50), writeday datetime)
insert into memo values(null, 'jang', 'ajax json 공부하자', '../avata/1.png', now())
create table ajaxboard(num int auto_increment primary key, writer varchar(20), subject varchar(100), content varchar(1000), avata varchar(50), writeday datetime)
DELETE FROM ajaxboard WHERE (num = 1) AND (writer = <NULL>) AND (subject = <NULL>) AND (content = <NULL>) AND (avata = <NULL>) AND (writeday = 2023-02-28 16:41:24.0)
DELETE FROM ajaxboard WHERE (num = 1) AND (writer = '<NULL>') AND (subject = '<NULL>') AND (content = '<NULL>') AND (avata = '<NULL>') AND (writeday = '2023-02-28 16:41:24')
delete from ajaxboard where num=1
create table member(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20), id varchar(20), pass varchar(20), hp varchar(20), addr varchar(100), eamil varchar(30), gaipday date)
alter table member drop column eamil
drop table member
create table member(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20), id varchar(20), pass varchar(20), hp varchar(20), addr varchar(100), email varchar(30), gaipday date)
insert into member values(null, '장환라', 'garlic', '1234', '010-8201-7151', '경기도 부천시 소사구','ghksfk1102@naver.com', now())
create table guest(num smallint auto_increment primary key, myid varchar(20), content varchar(2000), photoname varchar(50), chu smallint default 0, writeday datetime)
create table answer(idx smallint auto_increment primary key, num smallint, myid varchar(20), content varchar(1000), writeday datetime, foreign key(num) references guest(num) on delete cascade)
create table smartboard(num int auto_increment primary key, writer varchar(20), subject varchar(100), content varchar(2000), readcount int default 0, writeday datetime)
create table smartanswer(idx int primary key auto_increment, num int, nickname varchar(30), content varchar(1000), writeday datetime, foreign key(num) references smartboard(num) on delete cascade)
